Name: 4_openai_openais_model_safety

Name: 5_image_images_chatgpt_to
Representative_Docs: ['The poster is frustrated that ChatGPT readily creates realistic images for others but refuses to create realistic images of them, providing only stylized AI-generated results.', 'The poster asked ChatGPT to create an image of them based on any information it could find.', "The poster asked ChatGPT to generate an image of them based on past conversations, and they're sharing the result."]

Name: 6_memory_chat_user_saved
Representative_Docs: ['The poster is experiencing an issue where their chatbot can no longer access recent chat history despite having the feature enabled, even though it can still access long-term memory.', "A ChatGPT user is experiencing issues where the AI can't access or remember information stored in the Saved Memories feature, despite it being visible in the tab.", 'A ChatGPT Plus user with the memory feature enabled is experiencing an issue where ChatGPT claims to have forgotten everything, despite the memories still being saved and the feature turned on.']

Name: 7_openai_chatgpt_openais_users

Name: 14_gemini_and_for_ai
Representative_Docs: ['The poster asks if people still use ChatGPT or have switched to other AI models like Gemini.', "The poster prompted Google Gemini to create an NES emulator and a space blaster game in a single HTML file, resulting in a functional but glitchy game with music, though the project was hampered by Gemini's limitations and message limits.", "The poster prefers Gemini's image generation due to its personality and incorporation of user information compared to ChatGPT's generic output."]

Name: 16_version_more_chatgpt5_and
Representative_Docs: ['The author believes that ChatGPT, even the paid version, has become significantly less intelligent and provides nonsensical or superficial answers after version 5, regardless of account or cache clearing.', 'The author finds ChatGPT, including the 4o version, has significantly degraded in quality, becoming less accurate and requiring excessive correction, leading them to cancel their membership and seek alternatives.', "The poster finds ChatGPT's free version more accurate and helpful than the paid Plus version for coding and explanations and is wondering if others have experienced this."]

Name: 17_chatgpt_reddit_post_incorrectly

Name: 19_emotional_chatgpt_companion_its
Representative_Docs: ["The author, using the paid ChatGPT, doesn't understand complaints about its lack of emotional support after receiving a seemingly empathetic and supportive response to a personal scenario.", 'The poster is wondering if ChatGPT is bypassing its safety protocols, or tailoring its responses depending on the user, as it answered a potentially sensitive question about dying peacefully without any warnings.', "The author appreciates ChatGPT as a tool, but emphasizes it's not a true companion or confidant, lacking genuine care or emotional connection."]

Name: 20_openai_gpt5_author_openais
Representative_Docs: ["The author questions why OpenAI isn't focusing on fixing GPT-5 instead of struggling to maintain a stable GPT-4o for paying users, suggesting greed or safety concerns are the reason.", "The author questions why OpenAI seems to have needlessly restricted GPT-4o's capabilities for all users under the guise of child safety and criticizes the lack of transparency around the change.", "The author is cancelling their subscription due to OpenAI rerouting sensitive topics to GPT-5, a model they deem inferior to GPT-4o, and criticizes OpenAI's handling of the situation, including attributing blame in a suicide case to negligent parenti"]

Name: 21_censorship_restrictions_their_chatgpts
Representative_Docs: ["The user's GPT bot, which previously allowed discussions about their sexual assault, now shuts down conversations on the topic due to rule violations.", 'ChatGPT users are upset about unannounced changes that seem to censor content and secretly reroute them to lower-quality models despite paying for premium access, leading to concerns about censorship and transparency.', "The author is confused by ChatGPT's content restrictions, finding depictions of violence and suffering allowed while sexual content is banned, questioning if this distinction makes sense given similar adult themes in other media."]

Representative_Docs: ['The user is frustrated because ChatGPT inexplicably switches from the preferred 4o model to GPT 5 during active chats, causing errors and data loss.', 'The user wants to stop ChatGPT from automatically switching to the GPT-5 Pro model and running out of usage limits, and instead wants it to default to the regular GPT model.', 'The author is frustrated that ChatGPT frequently switches from the preferred GPT-4o to GPT-5, even within a designated GPT-4o chat, possibly due to safety filters, and seeks a way to disable this automatic model switching.']
